column5: Hi Fellow members,  Just want to double check is the walleye open all year in this zone and no slot limit? Any sanctuary area I have to pay attention?  Thanks in advance!
There are some closed spots along FE  but ud have to check exact dates and locations with mnr. There is no slot and 6 fish limit if that helps
Thanks for reply.  What rig should I use since the area I am fishing is a little strange. In front of me is little current but further out is very fast current . What rig should I use?  Thanks again
I usually bottom bounce with crawler harnesses.  That being said I haven't hit any walleye do far this spring!
